resp = client.indices.create(
    index="my-index-000001",
    mappings={
        "properties": {
            "manager": {
                "properties": {
                    "age": {
                        "type": "integer"
                    },
                    "name": {
                        "type": "text"
                    }
                }
            },
            "employees": {
                "type": "nested",
                "properties": {
                    "age": {
                        "type": "integer"
                    },
                    "name": {
                        "type": "text"
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)

    index="my-index-000001",
